t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    x = input()
    l = x.split(' ')
    ans = 0
    Max = -1
    for i in l:
        ans = ans + int(i)
        if Max < int(i):
            Max = int(i)
    print(ans + Max)
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    P = list(map(int, input().split()))
    T_A = P[0]
    T_B = P[0]
    for i in range(1, N - 1):
        T_A = T_A + P[i]
        T_B = T_B + P[i - 1]
        if T_B < T_A:
            T_B = T_B + (T_A - T_B)
    print(T_B + P[N - 2])

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    suffix = [0] * n
    for i in range(1, n):
        suffix[i] = suffix[i - 1] + p[i - 1]
    a = b = 0
    idx = 0
    while idx <= n - 2:
        if a >= suffix[idx + 1]:
            a += p[idx]
            b += p[idx]
            idx += 1
        else:
            diff = abs(a - suffix[idx + 1])
            a += diff
            b += diff
    print(b)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    ap = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    bp = ap.copy()
    (ai, bi, t) = (0, 0, 0)
    i = 0
    while ai < n - 1:
        if ai == bi:
            t += ap[ai]
            ap[ai] = 0
            ai += 1
        elif ap[ai] < bp[bi]:
            t += ap[ai]
            bp[bi] -= ap[ai]
            ap[ai] = 0
            ai += 1
        elif ap[ai] > bp[bi]:
            t += bp[bi]
            ap[ai] -= bp[bi]
            bp[bi] = 0
            bi += 1
        else:
            t += ap[ai]
            (ap[ai], bp[bi]) = (0, 0)
            ai += 1
            bi += 1
    while bi < n - 1:
        t += bp[bi]
        bi += 1
    print(t)

    for _ in range(T):
